statements: UPDATE web_applications SET app_name='New App Name', app_description='Updated description' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE web_applications SET app_description = 'Description Updated Again', created_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, app_name = 'Another New App Name' WHERE id = 2;
